definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: stocks, for confining feet of culprits (prob. loan-word fr. Aram. [[סַדָּא]], [[סַדָּנׇא]] sado0; NH [[סַד]], pl. [[סַדִּין]]); = Lat. nervus, Gk. podoka/kh;—abs. [[רַגְלַיִם]]´[[שִׂים בַּמּ]] Job 13:27 (LXX kw/lu/ma), Job 33:11 (SyrVer cu/lo/); (cf. syn. [[מַהְפֶּכֶת]], and Gk. equiv. there cited).
